Really? Flaming a torrent because you're not a fan of the Hardy's? 

If you don't like them, I understand, but there is no point in commenting on this.

Regarding your last post, you don't have to think drugs and acting like an ass are cool to like them. 

I've been Straightedge for 16 years, and I think Jeff is one of the most amazing wrestlers to date. Am I going to get pissed off and call you a faggot for disagreeing? No. I'm more mature than that.

Aside from all of that, awesome torrent. Will seed. (:
